text: ‘Gumazir damazir okavɨrɨziba ua gari, ezɨ gumazir suer amɨrɨziba uam arui. Ezɨ gumazir lepa itiba ua zuegha dera, ezɨ gumazir kuarir orazir puvatɨziba uam orasi. Ezɨ ovengezir gumaziba ua dɨkavima, ezɨ gumazir onganarazibagh amiba akar aghuim barasi.’(11:5) Godɨn akam inigha izezir gumazim Aisaia fomɨra ghaze, God uan adarazi Israelian akurvaghamim dughiam, arazir kaba otivam. Aisaia 35:1-7 ko 61:1-4ɨn gan.
